content:
path /v3/blockchain/auction/chain/contractAddress/fee
operationId GetAuctionFee
parameters
description Blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required True
schema
type string
description Contract address
in path
name contractAddress
required True
schema
type string
summary Get the NFT auction fee
description 1 credit per API call
Get the NFT auction fee
This API is supported for the following blockchains

BNB Smart Chain
Celo
Ethereum
Harmony
Polygon
responses
200
schema
type number
description Fee in percents
description OK
